title: Single Cell RNA-seq Quality Metric
description: Schema for submission of a scRNA-seq uniform pipeline quality metric.

n_records.title: Number Of Records
n_records.description: Number of records in BUS file.

n_barcodes.title: Number Of Barcodes
n_barcodes.description: Total number of valid cell barcodes detected.

n_barcode_umis.title: Number Of Barcode UMIs
n_barcode_umis.description: Total number of UMIs associated with cell barcodes.

median_reads_per_barcode.title: Median Reads Per Barcode
median_reads_per_barcode.description: Median number of reads per cell barcode.

mean_reads_per_barcode.title: Mean Reads Per Barcode
mean_reads_per_barcode.description: Mean number of reads per cell barcode.

median_umis_per_barcode.title: Median UMIs Per Barcode
median_umis_per_barcode.description: Median number of UMIs per cell barcode.

mean_umis_per_barcode.title: Mean UMIs Per Barcode
mean_umis_per_barcode.description: Mean number of UMIs per cell barcode.

gt_records.title: Good-Toulmin Estimation Records
gt_records.description: Number of BUS records for Good-Toulmin estimation.

num_barcodes_on_onlist.title: Number Of Barcodes On Onlist
num_barcodes_on_onlist.description: Number of cell barcodes matching an expected list of barcodes (onlist).

percentage_barcodes_on_onlist.title: Percentage Of Barcodes On Onlist
percentage_barcodes_on_onlist.description: Percentage of cell barcodes matching an expected list of barcodes (onlist).

num_reads_on_onlist.title: Number Of Reads On Onlist
num_reads_on_onlist.description: Number of reads associated with barcodes on the onlist.

percentage_reads_on_onlist.title: Percentage Of Reads On Onlist
percentage_reads_on_onlist.description: Percentage of reads associated with barcodes on the onlist.

rnaseq_kb_info.title: RNA-seq KB Info
rnaseq_kb_info.description: The content of the kb-python RNAseq kb_info.json file.

href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

n_targets.title: Number Of Target Sequences
n_targets.description: Total number of target sequences (e.g., transcripts) in the index.

n_bootstraps.title: Number Of Bootstrap Iterations
n_bootstraps.description: Number of bootstrap iterations used to estimate expression uncertainty.

n_processed.title: Number Of Reads Processed
n_processed.description: Number of valid reads processed by Kallisto.

n_pseudoaligned.title: Number Of Reads Pseudoaligned
n_pseudoaligned.description: Number of reads that could be pseudoaligned to the transcriptome index.

n_unique.title: Number Of Reads Uniquely Pseudoaligned
n_unique.description: Number of reads that could be pseudoaligned to a unique target sequence.

p_pseudoaligned.title: Percentage Of Reads Pseudoaligned
p_pseudoaligned.description: Percentage of reads that could be pseudoaligned to the transcriptome index.

p_unique.title: Percentage Of Reads Uniquely Pseudoaligned
p_unique.description: Percentage of reads that could be pseudoaligned to a unique target sequence.

index_version.title: Kallisto Index Version
index_version.description: Version of Kallisto index command used for building the transcriptome index.

kmer_length.title: K-mer Length
kmer_length.description: Length of k-mers used for building the transcriptome index.
